other_tests.procedure_name: CT-guided percutaneous placement of a drainage catheter
other_tests.findings: Initial noncontrast CT scan of the pelvis demonstrated a right lower quadrant collection with small areas of gas locules, measuring 4.5 x 3.5 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Final CT scan of the pelvis demonstrated the pigtail catheter within the collection and decreased size of the collection, compared to the scan at the initiation of the procedure.
